Apple Investing in Tesla Is a 'Poor Idea': Buffett

$AAPL $TSLA 

https://www.investopedia.com/news/apple-investing-tesla-poor-idea-buffett/

links.title: Apple Investing in Tesla Is a 'Poor Idea': Buffett
links.description: Despite calls for Apple Inc. ( AAPL) to invest in green car maker Tesla Inc. ( TSLA), Warren Buffett isn't a fan of the proposal. During an interview with Fox Business, the chief executive of Berkshire Hathaway and famed investor said that while he would support whatever Apple CEO Tim Cook did, he thinks it would "be a very poor idea to get in the auto business."

links.title: Warren Buffett's Birthday Celebration Includes Praise For Apple
links.description: CNBC and Warren Buffett have had quite the relationship over the years, with each year becoming more and more of a joyous celebration each time Mr. Buffett makes an appearance. Yesterday it was Mr. Buffett's 88th birthday so he was able to come on the CNBC network and pump up investors about the stock market, economy, and of course his favorite holdings, with Apple (AAPL ) getting the most attention.
